channel.title: TurmoilScape508 Source And Client Lastest Customs And Items, The new 508!
channel.description:
my first post! ok.. so i've been playin' 508 and i felt making a new source! so here it is
TurmoilScape508 made by turmoil spec (me) -Veng -Ancients -Turmoil -Vesta -Statius -Morrigan -Zuriel -Dagon' hai -Elite black -Dragon plate -Dragon claws -All the spirit shields -BH You need kills to spawn the rare items such as: 5Kills head 20KIlls weapon 15Kills body 10Kills legs The id's are inside the source Pics...
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/7453/turmoilscape508combat.png[/img] [img]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/133/turmoilscape508.png[/img] [img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/5757/turmoilscape508extra.png[/img]
Source: http://uppit.com/o8twf00ki6ng/TurmoilScape508_Made_by_Turmoil_Spec.rar Client: http://uppit.com/y1pxxfhb9gr2/TurmoilScape508's_official_client_made_by_Turmoil_Spec.rar (Also an IP Changer)

item.title: TurmoilScape508 Source And Client Lastest Customs And Items, The new 508!
item.dc:creator: @Turmoil2917 Turmoil2917
item.description:
@Turmoil2917 wrote:

[quote=“SheathKiller92, post:6, topic:406146”][quote author=Turmoil2917 link=topic=503142.msg3680949#msg3680949 date=1311526805]

Well done. This looks good but there’s one little problem, but anyone no matter how experienced could fix.
In the source folder, going into the batch files that are compile and run, the run beta’s script isn’t correct. You’ve put:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“I:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

When it should be:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

On the eighth line just change the “I” to an “C”, because then it’s trying to look for an I drive lol, but apart from that, looks very nice. ;D ;D
[/quote] uhm, thanks i like that u lkike it but my drive isnt C: but I: xd

Wow soz, I didnt know that there was such a drive lolz[/quote] me neither O_o but still i have it xd, cuz virus… grr

Read full topic
item.source: TurmoilScape508 Source And Client Lastest Customs And Items, The new 508!

Well done. This looks good but there’s one little problem, but anyone no matter how experienced could fix.
In the source folder, going into the batch files that are compile and run, the run beta’s script isn’t correct. You’ve put:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“I:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

When it should be:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

On the eighth line just change the “I” to an “C”, because then it’s trying to look for an I drive lol, but apart from that, looks very nice. ;D ;D
[/quote] uhm, thanks i like that u lkike it but my drive isnt C: but I: xd[/quote]

Wow soz, I didnt know that there was such a drive lolz

In the source folder, going into the batch files that are compile and run, the run beta’s script isn’t correct. You’ve put:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“I:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

When it should be:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594

On the eighth line just change the “I” to an “C”, because then it’s trying to look for an I drive lol, but apart from that, looks very nice. ;D ;D[/quote] uhm, thanks i like that u lkike it but my drive isnt C: but I: xd

item.title: TurmoilScape508 Source And Client Lastest Customs And Items, The new 508!
item.dc:creator: @SheathKiller92 SheathKiller92
item.description:
@SheathKiller92 wrote:

Well done. This looks good but there’s one little problem, but anyone no matter how experienced could fix.
In the source folder, going into the batch files that are compile and run, the run beta’s script isn’t correct. You’ve put:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“I:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

When it should be:
:index
cls
@echo off
color 4
echo Fetching latest updates…
title TurmoilScape by Turmoil Spec
cd …/TurmoilScapeData
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

On the eighth line just change the “I” to an “C”, because then it’s trying to look for an I drive lol, but apart from that, looks very nice. ;D ;D
EDIT: Also on the eighth line, put a c after “java”, but before the “.exe”, so that it’s ““C:\ProgramFiles\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” net\com\Server 43594”. NOTE: As far as I know, this change is only if your jdk is 1.6.0_23

Read full topic
